RockPy.Readin.machines module¶

RockPy.Readin.machines.Vftb(file, *args, **options)¶

read in routine for vftb files

header: 1:field [T] 2:mag [Am^2] 3:temp [C]
4:time [s] 5:std dev [%] 6:suscep [emu / g / Oe]
